meanings.sent1: After forgetting to inform her friend about the party, she quickly renotified her.
meanings.sent2: He renotified the team about the schedule change for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The phone kept renotifying her of the missed call, making her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The echo in the empty hallway renotified his footsteps, creating an eerie effect.
meanings.sent5: The bright flashing light renotified everyone of the emergency evacuation.

meanings.sent1: The renotifying of important updates ensured everyone was informed.
meanings.sent2: She received multiple renotifications about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The constant renotifying of the weather forecast became a running joke in the office.
meanings.sent4: The renotifying of the alarm system made sure everyone was aware of the fire drill.
meanings.sent5: The renotifying of the school closure due to snow was met with cheers from the students.
